thread.title: Live from CERAWeek: Dallas Fed CEO Robert Kaplan

author: Cnbc.Com Staff
title: Live from CERAWeek: Dallas Fed CEO Robert Kaplan

organizations.name: federal reserve bank of dallas cnbc

text:
Live from CERAWeek: Dallas Fed CEO Robert Kaplan, IHS Markit's Dan Yergin 11 Hours Ago Breaking News 
[This livestream has ended.] 
The energy industry's biggest event of the year is taking place in Houston this week, IHS Markit's CERAWeek annual energy summit. CERAWeek brings together the most powerful figures in the oil and gas industry, including the heads of super major oil companies from around the globe, and top energy officials from the Trump administration and oil nations in the OPEC bloc. 
Tuesday's keynote address features: Dr. Daniel Yergin, Vice Chairman, IHS Markit David Farr, Chairman & CEO, Emerson Robert Kaplan, President & CEO, Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas CNBC NEWSLETTERS
